talents.option1: +10/+10 Hand of God Heal/Heal Over Time
talents.option2: Hand of God applies a Strong Dispel

abilities.desc: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly.
abilities.name: Penitence

abilities.desc: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep\'s base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage. Can be cast on converted creeps to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.
abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.notes: Fully restores the creep's mana upon converting.

abilities.desc: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and armor.
abilities.name: Divine Favor

abilities.desc: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen\'s control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for 8 seconds afterwards.
abilities.name: Hand of God
abilities.notes: Can heal invulnerable and hidden/banished allies.
